name: If
natural_language_description: 这是 If 节点。主要用于: Route items to different branches (true/false)

conditions.name: conditions
conditions.description: The type of values to compare
conditions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conditions | 作用: The type of values to compare | 默认值: {}

combineOperation.name: combineOperation
combineOperation.description: If multiple rules got set this settings decides if it is true as soon as ANY condition matches or only if ALL get meet
combineOperation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Combine | 作用: If multiple rules got set this settings decides if it is true as soon as ANY condition matches or only if ALL get meet | 默认值: all
available_options: ALL (值: all) - Only if all conditions are met it goes into "true" branch
ANY (值: any) - If any of the conditions is met it goes into "true" branch
